title: 44 Texas Companies That Are Great Places to Work
description: All of these businesses based in Texas made Inc.’s 2025 Best Workplaces list.
author: Victoria Salves
excerpt: All of these 44 companies based in the state of Texas made Inc.’s 2025 Best Workplaces list of companies with best-in-class benefits.
text: A large percentage of the companies on Inc.’s 2025 list of the Best Workplaces are based in the Lone Star State. Of the 514 companies that made the list, 44 are in Texas. Inc.’s annual list, compiled in partnership with Quantum Workplace, honors companies that invest in strong workplace cultures and offer best-in-class benefits to their employees.The list of Texas businesses that were honored include many companies from the Austin and Dallas-Fort Worth metro areas. They also span a diverse range of industries, including tech, finance, energy, and marketing. Here are the 44 Texas companies that made the Best Workplaces list:5 & 5Frisco, TexasA leading IT and digital platform management company specializing in SaaS implementations, digital strategy, and managed services in the restaurant industry.Acadian GroupFrisco, TexasA general contracting firm that protect their people and businesses through all phases of an emergency.Arm CandyDallasA full-service media intelligence agency that partners with agencies, brands, and ad technology companies to and in-person events, interpreter scheduling, AI-powered interpretation tools, and more.CartographAustinAmazon-focused agency specializing in the better-for-you CPG space and offering fully outsourced management of the Amazon channel.CloudServusAustinA consultancy firm aiming to be a Top 1% Microsoft consulting and licensing partner.ENTOUCHRichardson, TexasAn energy management and smart-building technology firm, offering innovative solutions that reduce energy usage, increase profitability, and simplify facility management for businesses.Erben AssociatesAustinA team of family wealth advisers helping business owners and executives with their transition and personal wealth planning.Essential LendingFort WorthProvides fast, secure, and convenient online consumer installment loans with elevating brand stories and crafting digital journeys for startups, nonprofits and admired brands.IntegrityDallasA leading distributor of life and health insurance, offering wealth management and retirement solutions from its Dallas headquarters.Interplay LearningAustinHelps organizations and schools upskill, reduce risk, and increase operational readiness using instructor-led training, online simulations, AI, and VR.Jacaruso EnterprisesRound Rock, TexasA provider of remote sales service and training for small to medium-size hotels.JB WarrantiesArgyle, TexasA premier provider of extended html:
A large percentage of the companies on Inc.’s 2025 list of the Best Workplaces are based in the Lone Star State. Of the 514 companies that made the list, 44 are in Texas. Inc.’s annual list, compiled in partnership with Quantum Workplace, honors companies that invest in strong workplace cultures and offer best-in-class benefits to their employees.

The list of Texas businesses that were honored include many companies from the Austin and Dallas-Fort Worth metro areas. They also span a diverse range of industries, including tech, finance, energy, and marketing. 

Here are the 44 Texas companies that made the Best Workplaces list:

5 & 5
Frisco, Texas
A leading IT and digital platform management company specializing in SaaS implementations, digital strategy, and managed services in the restaurant industry.

Acadian Group
Frisco, Texas
A general contracting firm that builds multifamily projects in Texas.

AED123
Dallas
Provides automated external defibrillators and related services to businesses and organizations.

Alafair Biosciences
Austin
A medical device company commercializing a patented platform technology using natural biopolymers to address postoperative soft tissue recovery, for surgical use.

AlertMedia
Austin
A software company helping organizations protect their people and businesses through all phases of an emergency.

Arm Candy
Dallas
A full-service media intelligence agency that partners with agencies, brands, and ad technology companies to deliver advertising services.

Associated Luxury Hotels International
Plano, Texas
A member-only global sales organization dedicated to serving the meeting and event marketplace for over 35 years.

ATX Family Dental
Austin
A dental practice dedicated to exceptional clinical care, patient comfort, and a welcoming atmosphere.

Boostlingo
Austin
Specializes in on-demand interpretation, multilingual online and in-person events, interpreter scheduling, AI-powered interpretation tools, and more.

Cartograph
Austin
Amazon-focused agency specializing in the better-for-you CPG space and offering fully outsourced management of the Amazon channel.

CloudServus
Austin
A consultancy firm aiming to be a Top 1% Microsoft consulting and licensing partner.

ENTOUCH
Richardson, Texas
An energy management and smart-building technology firm, offering innovative solutions that reduce energy usage, increase profitability, and simplify facility management for businesses.

Erben Associates
Austin
A team of family wealth advisers helping business owners and executives with their transition and personal wealth planning.

Essential Lending
Fort Worth
Provides fast, secure, and convenient online consumer installment loans with flexible repayment options and a streamlined application process.

Fundbox
Plano, Texas
Allows small businesses to access funding through revolving lines of credit and other lending products.

Genius Road
Dallas
A technical and executive recruiting firm helping clients secure the best talent by taking the time to understand the right fit.

GLIDE
Austin
A B-Corp web design and development agency elevating brand stories and crafting digital journeys for startups, nonprofits and admired brands.

Integrity
Dallas
A leading distributor of life and health insurance, offering wealth management and retirement solutions from its Dallas headquarters.

Interplay Learning
Austin
Helps organizations and schools upskill, reduce risk, and increase operational readiness using instructor-led training, online simulations, AI, and VR.

Jacaruso Enterprises
Round Rock, Texas
A provider of remote sales service and training for small to medium-size hotels.

JB Warranties
Argyle, Texas
A premier provider of extended warranties in the heating and air conditioning industry.

KUNGFU.AI
Austin
A management consulting and engineering firm focused exclusively on artificial intelligence.

Limetree
Dallas
A behavioral marketing company dedicated to making marketing more effective by uniting data, behavioral science, and design.

MALK Organics
Austin
A producer of plant-based milk on a mission to deliver the cleanest products free of dairy, gums, fillers, gluten, oils, and GMOs.

Monarch Resource Partners
College Station, Texas
The maker of the first 100 percent electric-drive mobile fleet in the gas compression industry, providing increased volumetric flexibility, superior reliability, and compression alternative.

NinjaOne
Austin
Offers a platform empowering more than 24,000 IT teams with visibility, security, and control over all endpoints.

Norwood
Austin
A health care staffing and consulting company specializing in mid-revenue cycle management.

Ontic
Austin
A security software provider that helps corporate security teams collect and connect data for a comprehensive view of the security landscape.

Ownwell
Austin
A tax firm providing all the tools, resources, and information necessary for property owners to manage their real estate with confidence.

Point of Rental Software
Fort Worth, Texas
Provides rental and inventory management software solutions that connect people from every rental vertical and job role.

Praetorian Security
Austin
A cybersecurity company with a mission is to prevent breaches before they occur.

Preferred Corporate Housing
Houston, Texas
A leading provider of premium, furnished temporary housing solutions spanning North America, encompassing even the most remote destinations.

Project Mockingbird Company
Dallas
A full-service public relations and communications agency working solely with social impact organizations to champion life-changing work around the world.

Proof Advertising
Austin
A full-service advertising agency empowering brands to break free, chart their own course, and achieve success in today’s fast-moving world.

QbDVision
Austin
A software company changing how pharma and biotech companies manage the development of their manufacturing process for patient therapies.

Skimmer
Austin
Offers everything the modern pool pro needs to modernize their pool service business in one easy-to-use platform.

Sphero
Greenville, Texas
A robotics company transforming PK–12 education with accessible tools that encourage exploration, imagination, and perseverance through STEAM and computer science.

Texas Creative
San Antonio, Texas
An award-winning, full-service agency applying the core tenets of strategy, creativity, and innovation.

The MB Group
Plano, Texas
A dynamic CPA firm specializing in accounting, tax, and advisory.

The Vested Group
Plano, Texas
A leading provider of NetSuite solutions, specializing in cloud-based ERP, CRM, and e-commerce implementations, with a commitment to optimizing business processes.

TimelyCare
Fort Worth
A trusted virtual health and well-being provider with services designed to empower students to take charge of their wellness journeys.

U.S. Energy Development Corporation
Fort Worth
A privately held exploration and production (E&P) firm investing in and actively managing substantial energy and real estate assets.

Venturity
Dallas
Provides comprehensive finance, accounting, and advisory services, so businesses don’t have to hire a dedicated accounting department.

Wichita Falls Chamber of Commerce
Wichita Falls, Texas
A business service organization working with companies from startups to Fortune 500 to accelerate the Wichita Falls economy.

The early-rate deadline for the 2025 Inc. Power Partner Awards is this Friday, June 27, at 11:59 p.m. PT. Apply now.
